title: OpenClaw Helm Chart Values
description: Configuration values for the OpenClaw Helm chart. OpenClaw is a single-instance AI assistant â€” do NOT increase replica count.

configMode.description: Config mode: `merge` preserves runtime changes, `overwrite` for strict GitOps

chromium.description: Chromium sidecar for browser automation (CDP on port 9222)

replicas.description: Number of replicas (must be 1, OpenClaw doesn't support horizontal scaling)

enabled.description: Enable network policy (default deny-all with explicit allow rules)

openclawVersion.description: OpenClaw image version (used by all OpenClaw containers)

ipFamilyPolicy.description: IPv4-only (see trustedProxies note in gateway config)
